item.title: Gorillas: Special offer - unicorn slices, 150g 🦍❤️
item.description:
We felt more like “Oh fuck, Databreach”
Dieser Artikel ist auch auf deutsch erschienen.
During the pandemic, grocery delivery services gained popularity. New players on the market offer delivery in under an hour. One of them is Gorillas, which not only delivers apples and granola bars in 10 minutes, but just as quickly delivered the data of all its customers. How could this happen? Unfortunately, it was once again much too simple. But let’s start at the beginning:

item.title: How to waste time and overcomplicate things — Ryan Warnock
Goals Are Arbitrary
item.description: I have the pleasure of having impressive friends who have completed and continue to complete spectacular athletic feats. Some crossed the alps with a single speed steel tandem bike. Some run 10k in 35’. Some run half-marathons with more than 2000m of elevation literally called inferno. And then, of course, there is the camp of people who go about this whole ironman business.

item.title: An Introduction and Tutorial for Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: Azure Cosmos DB is a globally distributed, JSON-based database delivered as a ‘Platform as a Service’ (PaaS) in Microsoft Azure. Learn about the benefits and disadvantages of Azure Cosmos DB. Find out more about this database and discover how to interact with it using tools, SDKs, and APIs.

item.title: Couchbase Mobile 3 Brings New C and Kotlin APIs, Simplified Administration
item.description: NoSQL database maker Couchbase has released Couchbase Mobile 3, its edge-ready mobile database, introducing a new C API to embed Couchbase Lite on embedded platforms, Kotlin support on Android, a new administration REST API, and security enhancements.
